page.title: 03THE CHAPEL
page.content: The chapel was built in 1857. We intevewied the people who went to chapel. Most of them got married in chapel.They stay in chapel for one hour.Three people go to chapel twice on Sunday,s at 11 oclock and 7 oclock. Most people go to chapel every week.In chapel people sing,pray and generaly help others. About 20 people go to chapel at night and 12 people go in the morning.On Monday's the chapel organises refreshments for the Monday market.The minister works on a circuit of several villages but lives in Methwold.Other activities include Sunday School (not many young people attend!) and a Women's group.
